def_cn: 将…还押候审;使取保候审
def_en: If a person who is accused of a crime is remanded in custody or on bail, they are told to return to the court at a later date, when their trial will take place.

def_cn: 还押候审（期）；取保候审（期）
def_en: Remand is used to refer to the process of remanding someone in custody or on bail, or to the period of time until their trial begins.
